## Handy tricks

Use this file to store any helpful things you learned that don't necessarily
fit into any particular lecture topic.

## RStudio

If you are rearranging for loops, functions, etc. and need to fix the 
indentation of your code, highlight the code that you want to fix and 
go to Code --> Reindent lines.
